alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 12:02AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hamilton and Echols Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1202 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, Statenville, Blue Springs, Crossroads and Mayday. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
